title: [Blighted Forest, Treetop]
description: The maze of trails crossing intersecting limbs of the massive oak trees grows thin, and finally impassable to the south, where smaller branches replace the wide boughs.  Breaks in the surrounding foliage reveal a grotto on the forest floor below.  In its center sits some kind of rock formation.

The maze of trails crossing intersecting limbs of the massive oak trees grows thin, and finally impassable to the south, where smaller branches replace the wide boughs.  Breaks in the surrounding foliage reveal a shadowy grotto on the forest floor below.  In its center sits some kind of rock formation.
